TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TextCompositionAutoComplete extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Defines a set of states for the handling of automatic completion of a text composition.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionAutoComplete Off = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionAutoComplete On = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Auto-complete is on. A <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event will be raised automatically by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager> after a <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> event is handled.
